reviews.title: A really relaxing hotel

likes.disliked: — Lack of flavour in evening meal

reviews.text: staff were grumpy and unhelpful in finding us somewhere to
sit in the lounge when we wanted a pre lunch drink. At this
reviews.title: Maybe we were unlucky

reviews.text: point, we almost left and went elsewhere!
reviews.title: Fantastic wedding, fantastic service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Having visited East Lodge earlier this year, we returned again for another wonderful weekend at this gem of a hotel in the heart of Derbyshire. Nothing is too much trouble for any of the staff at East Lodge and you are treated as individuals and not just another number as often happens in other hotels at which we have stayed. What more can be said other than that East Lodge is just perfection.
reviews.title: Wonderful Hotel

likes.liked: — everything, but the chocolate dessert was just out of this world

reviews.title: Anniversary haven
reviews.text: My husband booked this hotel for a surprise 2night break to celebrate our 1st wedding anniversary. It was a lovely location, the staff were extremely polite, presentable and helpful. We had an initlal problem with the room temperature but this was swiftly resolved. The room was a bit small but beautifully furnished and appointed. The standards of cleanliness, quality and tidiness throughout the hotel were second to none. We dined in the restaurant due to its reputation, and were not disappointed. This was one of the reasons the hotel was chosen. The menu choice, presentation of food, quality and taste were superb - and the service was excellent too. Breakfasts were as you would expect - plenty of choice, waitress served and quality food. An experience not to be missed and we would certainly make a return visit and recommend this hotel to everyone we could.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A thoroughly enjoyable two night break. We received a warm welcome and all staff were polite, friendly, approachable and very well turned out at all times. The room was well appointed, warm and most comfortable. All food was of a very high standard. We will certainly return to this hotel based on our experiences. Thank you to all staff for such a great weekend.
reviews.title: Wonderfully relaxing break

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a homey, comfy, lovely place. Feels like a home. Rooms have slanted floors and ours had 3 messages carved in the window glass from the 1800's. Yet the cleanliness and modern bathrooms make it up-to-date. Our room lacked nothing except the closet was so close to the bed that only one person at a time could use it. Small complaint. Bed excellent. Quiet. lovely view. Pleasant grounds with a beautiful garden. Food excellent. Highest quality. Staff superb--warm, caring and professional. Great location. 10 minutes from Chatsworth. Not much more to Haddon Hall and Hardwick Hall.
reviews.title: A Home Away From Home

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I think we were unlucky in some respects hence my average rather than above average
reviews.title: Stunning Setting
Afternoon Tea
reviews.text: I took two visitors from the USA to East Lodge for Afternoon Tea.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It was a beautiful day so we were able to sit on the patio overlooking the lake. The tea was gorgeous and beautifully presented . Staff were excellent.
reviews.title: Best Weekend of my life!

likes.disliked: — There was nothing not to like.

reviews.text: My Wife and I had our Wedding reception at East Lodge in early June. We had the hotel for the whole weekend. This also meant we had to have all 12 bedrooms included in the price, which wasn't a problem as we both have big families needing somewhere to stay and were quite happy with this.
reviews.title: No response to my complaints

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Every single guest that came to celebrate with us that day (120 in total), could not believe how amazing the place was....from the grounds, to the most delicious food that was served not only for the Wedding Breakfast but for the hotel guests all weekend (all inclusive with the price).
reviews.title: Freezing cold room & appalling customer service
Cold winter breaks
reviews.text: My wife and I are so happy we chose East Lodge for our Reception, and loved it so much we are going to stay here again...even though we only live 4 miles away!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is set back from the road with views over the hills or across the garden. The staff are very welcoming and friendly. This is an excellent small hotel for exploring the Peak District and returning in the evening for a drink in the conservatory and some excellent food and wine in the restaurant overlooking the mature garden and pond. Breakfasts are very good and the rooms are spacious, quiet and very comfortable.
reviews.title: Warm welcome and good food in the Peak District

reviews.text: A truely excellent hotel well worthy of its 4 star rating. The best hotel resturant I have ever stayed at and a most welcome and friendly service. Attention to detail was impressive.
reviews.title: outstanding family run hotel

likes.liked: — the whole expereince including the quality of the food

reviews.text: Great location for Chatsworth House and the National Park.
reviews.title: Perfect from start to finish..

reviews.text: Small hotel which is a far cry from the municipal treatment of many major brands.
reviews.title: Fantastic Wedding

likes.liked: — The Friendly Staff Atmosphere and fantastic food
likes.disliked: — Sister had young children not really welcome

reviews.text: Having looked at several locations for our wedding we selected East Lodge. We fell in love with the venue immediately and the initial staff we had contact with were also very good. Throughout the whole planning process East Lodge staff were great. I made many (probably too many!) phone calls, visited on lots of occasions and was always made to feel important.
reviews.title: Wonderful food, freezing accommodation

likes.liked: — The fabulous food in the restaurant
